release_notes.en-US:
Fixes compatibility issues with Thunderbird 16.

UPDATE: Fixes problems with the context menu as well.

release_notes.en-US:
Adds compatibility with Postbox 3.0
Fixes context menu bugs
Improve View Source code

release_notes.en-US:
* Adds support for Thunderbird 5

* Fixes the autosuggest bugs

* Fixes plugin and settings window bugs (causing the message loading error)

* Fixes Meta Redirect issues

* Fixed statusbar shift issues

* Fixed scrolling issue

* And a bunch of other stuff!

release_notes.en-US:
This is a compatibility and performance build. Here's what has been changed:
  • Added compatibility for Postbox 2.1 and up
  • Fixed bookmarks slowness
  • Fixed inability to use bookmarks menu after choosing a menu item
  • Fixed uninstaller bugs with disabling
  • Updated uninstaller to work with newer versions of Gecko (the extension manager interface we used is being/has been removed)
  • Fixed problems with plugins
  • Speed up ThunderBrowse startup (removed the incompatible extension check as it's not needed anymore)
  • Fixed issues with event code
  • Updated locales
  • General bug fixes
For more, see tbit:changelog while in ThunderBrowse.

release_notes.en-US:
This build contains loads of bug fixes, compatibility enhancements and new features. In a nutshell:
  • 3.3.4 Fixed NM tab problems
  • Popup window now has the ability to use tabs
  • Added framework to support Postbox tabs (if they ever allow tab registration)
  • Fixed the invalid host name error
  • Fixed problems with links not capturing in events
  • Fixed the mail bar not displaying
  • Fixed chrome overlay issues
  • Fixed compatibility support. Postbox 2 now works.
  • Improved event handling and page loading
  • Improvements to favicon handling
For more details, see

release_notes.en-US:
Covers lots of fixes and improvements from the last version, here's what has changed:
  • Added TB3 tabs support for Spicebird.
  • Fixed some initialization issues in certain versions of Postbox Pro
  • Added support for Postbox Express
  • Fixed homepage url issues, where new tabs would lead to a 404
  • Fixed issues with event handlers
  • Added progress meters
For everything else, there's tbit:changelog

release_notes.en-US:
ThunderBrowse 3.3.1 adds bug fixes that did not make it into ThunderBrowse 3.3. Most of these bug fixes apply to Thunderbird 2.
  • Fixed issue with external protocols not enabling the launcher
  • Fixed settings window size issues in Thunderbird 2
  • Fixed settings window load issues on non-Thunderbird builds
  • Updated locales that did not receive updates
  • Fixed the left click new tab not working bug
For complete change log, visit tbit:changelog while in ThunderBrowse.

release_notes.en-US:
Major compatibility release!! Contains:
  • TONS of bug fixes
  • Support for Spicebird
  • TB2 Tabs with Thunderbird 3 versions now work again. The issue stems to a problem with Mozilla removing the close button widget from the tabs element. This has been fixed.
  • Several code stalls have been repaired
  • Support for RESET form buttons
  • Improvements in form handling (specifically radio buttons and checkboxes)
  • Small style changes
  • A few fixes in external browser launching (this should fix any problems you had before [as it worked in my tests])
  • Fixed favicon issues with TB3Tabs
  • Several main window style issues
  • Settings window height has been increased so the buttons will still be visible when selecting different tab styles
  • Improvement of charset rendering (your mileage may vary here)
  • Argentinean Spanish Support (es-AR) by KNTRO
  • Spicebird support (its missing a few small things [specifically, the toolbar buttons and the bookmark menu placement is off])
  • Various loading Iimprovements (Pages load faster now)
  • More form event fixes (Specifically the enter key)
  • Javascript code loads correctly
  • ThunderBrowse uses less memory
  • Seriously, way faster page loading
  • Better expression checking
  • Removed unnecessary object conversions
  • And a bunch more fixes!
For the complete changelog visit: tbit:changelog while in ThunderBrowse.

release_notes.en-US:
Fixes bugs from 3.2.7 and adds a couple of improvements.
  • Fixed tab sync in the settings window for TB2
  • Added support for the findbar and document printing for TB3 tabs
  • Fixed text zooming on TB3 tabs
  • Fixed some appearance bugs with tab titles
  • Added Session Saving and Restoring
  • Readded 2 languages (Russian, Indonesian) and added support for 2 new ones (Estonian, Japanese)
  • Fixed some bugs with the API
  • Fixed bookmark loading
  • Allowed ThunderBrowse to hook into contentTabs (you can turn this off via extensions.tbrowse.contentTabs)
For more info and a complete change log, goto tbit:changelog while in ThunderBrowse.

Fixes bugs from 3.2.7 and adds a couple of improvements.
  • Added support for the findbar and document printing for TB3 tabs
  • Fixed text zooming on TB3 tabs
  • Fixed some appearance bugs with tab titles
  • Added Session Saving and Restoring
  • Readded 2 languages (Russian, Indonesian) and added support for 2 new ones (Estonian, Japanese)

release_notes.en-US:
See this blog post for details about the new features in this version.
  • New tab system that revolves around the tabs in Thunderbird 3 (you can choose which tab system you like)
  • RSS Headers have been fixed
  • Fixed gloda search bug
  • New open link in new tab filter
  • Tons of bug fixes
For everything else, there's tbit:changelog

release_notes.en-US: Adds support for Thunderbird 3: RC1 and the newest Postbox builds. Fixes a small problem with the wizard and a few other small fixes. For everything else, there's tbit:changelog

release_notes.en-US: Fixes bugs with the new click engine, fixes a bunch of bugs with forms, tab options now save the correct values, fixed conflicts with extensions that use gestures, and other fixes. For a complete list, check out tbit:changelog or the ThunderBlog.

release_notes.en-US: Includes updated language files. No new features or code changes. Changes in last version (3.2.6.2) were: Adds support and compatibility fixes up to Thunderbird 3.0b4pre, Postbox support, brand new click engine (please report any problems you have to the bug tracker) and some bug fixes. For everything else, there's tbit:changelog

release_notes.en-US: Resolved conflicts with Thunderbird 3 nightlies.

release_notes.en-US: Fixes tons of bugs and improves usability, encoding of POST requests, and AutoComplete. There are several new settings included in this version. For a complete list of changes visit tbit:changelog.
Fixes url problems, encoding, UI and style issues, includes support for TB3.0b3pre, fixes cookie conflict in TB3.0b3pre and much more! Check tbit:changelog for details.
Tons of bug fixes, new features, changed code, improvements, new settings window, lots and lots of stuff. Check tbit:changelog for more info.
Fixes Shredder bug that causes window to go blank. For everything else, there's tbit:changelog
Bug fixes, a tad of reorganization, checks for image permissions, and includes support for 3.0b1pre. For everything else, there's tbit:changelog
